title: Spot goes to a party
brief_description: Spot goes to a party: Spot has a great cowboy costume for Helen’s fancy dress party, but where are Tom and Steve? “Spot’s winter sports”: Spot and his friends have a wonderful time in the snow. When they build a snowman, Spot decides to take it home. “Spot goes to the fair”: After a lively day at the fair, Spot and his friends decide it can sometimes be fun to be frightened. “Spot’s favourite toy”: Spot can’t decide which toy he likes best, but he soon discovers his favourite at bedtime. “Spot’s first picnic”: When Spot and his friends go on a picnic they all end up wet and hungry. “Spot at the playground”: Spot, Steve and Helen love to visit the playground, where they have fun on the swings, slide and climbing frame. “Storytime with Spot”: Spot finds lots of ways to play with books as he waits for his Mum to read him a story.
